content:
The Actions & Recommendations component gives your users easy access to any flows that are enabled for their Console. Flows from this component launch in a nested subtab for the record. You can switch between records to view information to use in other tabs.

The Actions & Recommendations component is ideal if you want to keep your Swarming actions, including flows and related lists, in a dedicated Swarming tab that helps reduce page crowding.

To create an Actions & Recommendations deployment:

* From Setup, enter Actions & Recommendations.
* Select New Deployment.
* Give your new deployment a brief and descriptive name like Swarming Flows.
* Select Flows and quick actions.
* Select an object that supports Swarming, such as Case or Incident.
* In the Default tab, use these flows as the channel default actions for the deployment.

To add Actions & Recommendations to your object record page layout:

* Go to Lightning App Builder.
* Add the Actions & Recommendations component to your page layout.
* Select the Swarming Flows deployment.
title: Setting Up Swarm with Actions & Recommendations in Salesforce
